'''2.2.2161''' ([[wikipedia:Microsoft Windows|Windows]]), '''2.2.2162''' ([[wikipedia:MacOS|macOS]]), or '''2.2.2159''' ([[wikipedia:Linux|Linux]]), is an update to the [[Minecraft launcher|launcher]] released on March 1, 2021.

== Changes ==
* Introduced a major overhaul to the launcher, with an upgraded version of Chromium.
* Introduced  automatic update functionality on Linux (similar to macOS and Windows).
* Ended support for Mac OS 10.9 because of the Chromium update.

== Fixes ==
* {{Bug|MCL-17045}} Game crashes directly after launch (caused by [[Mods/OptiFine|Optifine]]).
* {{Bug|MCL-17053}} Flames of the Nether DLC news article was incorrectly sized.
* {{Bug|MCL-15849}} Launcher uses outdated Chrome version for sign-in.
* {{Bug|MCL-17098}} Animation of Minecraft Dungeons Play button breaks said button.
